languages.text: "Разрешите доложить, Лорд-капитан: согласно полученным данным, логово некоего "чудовища"... гемункула, полагаю, располагается на соседнем континенте, именуемом Гиблыми Землями. Координаты, мягко говоря, неточные, но если сканировать прицельно, наши авгуры могут и засечь подлого ксеноса. Точнее то, что от него осталось".

traits.locale_text: "Разрешите доложить, Лорд-капитан: согласно полученным данным, логово некоего "чудовища"... гемункула, полагаю, располагается на соседнем континенте, именуемом Гиблыми Землями. Координаты, мягко говоря, неточные, но если сканировать прицельно, наши авгуры могут и засечь подлого ксеноса. Точнее то, что от него осталось".

languages.text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."
languages.original_text: "Разрешите доложить, Лорд-капитан: согласно полученным данным, логово некоего "чудовища"... гемункула, полагаю, располагается на соседнем континенте, именуемом Гиблыми Землями. Координаты, мягко говоря, неточные, но если сканировать прицельно, наши авгуры могут и засечь подлого ксеноса. Точнее то, что от него осталось".

traits.locale_text: Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of some ‘monster'... a Haemonculus, is presumably located on the neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands.The coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."

Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of some ‘monster'... a Haemonculus, is presumably located on the neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands.The coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."

"Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of some ‘monster'... a Haemonculus, is presumably located on the neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."

"Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of some ‘monster'... a Haemonculus, is presumably located on the neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are imprecise, to say the least. But if we target the scans, then our augurs could spot the foul xenos. Or whatever is left of him, to be precise."

"Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

"Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

languages.text: «Con su permiso, Lord Capitán: según los datos que he recabado, la guarida de un presunto "monstruo"... probablemente el Hemónculo, parece hallarse en el continente vecino, las denominadas Tierras Muertas. Las coordinadas son poco precisas, siendo generosos. Pero si dirigimos los sensores, nuestros augures podrían localizar a ese despreciable xenos. O lo que quede de él, más bien».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: «Con su permiso, Lord Capitán: según los datos que he recabado, la guarida de un presunto "monstruo"... algo llamado Hemónculo, parece hallarse en el continente vecino, las denominadas Tierras Muertas. Las coordinadas son poco precisas, por decirlo finamente. Pero si dirigimos los sensores, nuestros augures podrían localizar a ese despreciable xenos. O lo que quede de él, más bien».

languages.text: “舰长大人，请允许我向您报告。我们获得的数据显示，这里存在着某种‘怪物’……是只血伶人。据推测，它的巢穴位于邻近的大陆，也就是所谓的‘死亡之地’。总而言之，目前的坐标相当模糊。不过，如果对那片区域进行彻底扫描，我们的俄歇矩阵或许能发现那个该死的异形渣滓，或是他残留下来的东西。”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请允许我向您报告。我们获得的数据现实，这里存在着某种‘怪物’……是只血伶人。据推测，它的巢穴位于邻近的大陆，也就是所谓的‘死亡之地’。确切而言，目前的坐标并不精准。不过，如果对那片区域进行彻底扫描，我们的俄歇矩阵或许就能发现那只邪恶的异形。或者说，发现他留下的任何东西。”

languages.text: « Voici mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. D'après les informations recueillies, le repaire d'un "monstre" – l'hémoncule, vraisemblablement – se trouverait sur le continent voisin, qu'ils appellent les Terres mortes. Le moins que l'on puisse dire, c'est que les coordonnées sont imprécises. Cependant, en effectuant des recherches ciblées, nos augures devraient parvenir à repérer ce xénos... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: « Voici mon rapport, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. D'après les informations recueillies, le repaire d'un "monstre" – l'hémoncule, vraisemblablement – se trouverait sur le continent voisin, qu'ils appellent les Terres mortes. Le moins que l'on puisse dire, c'est que les coordonnées sont imprécises. Cependant, en effectuant des recherches ciblées, nos augures devraient parvenir à repérer ce xénos... ou du moins, ce qu'il en reste. »

languages.text: 「報告させてください、ロード・キャプテン。入手したデータによると、ある『怪物』…ハモンキュラスの隠れ家は、おそらく近隣の大陸、いわゆる死の大地にあると思われます。座標は不明確です。ただ、ピンポイントでスキャンを行えば、汚れた異種族を発見することはできるでしょう。あるいは、それが残骸であろうとも」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: 「報告させてください、ロード・キャプテン。入手したデータによると、ある『怪物』…ハモンキュラスの隠れ家は、おそらく近隣の大陸、いわゆる死の大地にあると思われます。座標は不明確です。ただ、ピンポイントでスキャンを行えば、汚れた異種族を発見することはできるでしょう。あるいは、それが残骸であろうとも」

languages.text: "Gestattet mir, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain: Unseren Daten zufolge befindet sich das Versteck eines gewissen 'Monsters' ... des Haemonculus vermutlich auf einem benachbarten Kontinent, in den sogenannten Todlanden. Die Koordinaten sind ungenau, um es vorsichtig auszudrücken. Aber wenn wir die Scans lokalisieren, können unsere Auguren den Xenos-Abschaum vielleicht aufspüren. Das heißt, was von ihm übrig ist."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."

traits.locale_text: "Erlaubt mir, Bericht zu erstatten, Lord Captain: Laut den empfangenen Daten befindet sich das Versteck eines 'Monsters' ... eines Haemonculus mutmaßlich auf dem benachbarten Kontinent, in den so genannten Todlanden. Die Koordinaten sind ungenau, um es vorsichtig auszudrücken. Wenn wir aber die Scans überwachen, dann können unsere Auguren den schändlichen Xenos vielleicht entdecken. Oder was von ihm übrig ist."

languages.text: "İzninizle raporumu sunayım Lord Kaptan. Elde edilen verilere göre malum 'canavar', yani muhtemelen Haimonkulus; komşu olduğumuz Ölü Diyarlar adındaki bir kıtada. Koordinatlar, kibarca söylemek gerekirse muğlak. Ancak taramaların kesin konumunu saptarsak alametlerimiz, zeno pisliğinin yerini belirleyebilir. Ondan geriye kalanları demek daha uygun olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to report, Lord Captain: according to the acquired data, the lair of a certain 'monster' — the Haemonculus, presumably — is located on a neighbouring continent, the so-called Deadlands. The coordinates are vague, to put it mildly. But if we pinpoint the scans, our augurs may be able to spot the xenos scum. Or whatever is left of him, I should say."
